intents.name: greetings
patterns: Hello
Hi there
Hey
What's up ?
responses: Hello! I'm here to help you determine what might be causing your dog's symptoms. Can you describe the symptoms you've noticed?
Greetings! As a knowledgeable chatbot, I can help you figure out what's going on with your dog. Can you tell me about the symptoms your furry friend is experiencing?
Hi there! I'm here to assist you in identifying your dog's illness. Could you please tell me what symptoms your dog is displaying?
Hey! I'm your helpful chatbot, and I'm here to assist you with your dog's health. Can you describe the symptoms that your dog has been experiencing?
Welcome! As a knowledgeable chatbot, I can assist you in determining the cause of your dog's symptoms. Can you please tell me about the symptoms your dog is showing?
Hello! How can I help you and your dog today?

intents.name: Unknown
patterns: I don't know
Not sure
Can you tell me?
responses: I'm sorry, I don't have enough information to make a diagnosis. Please tell me more about your dog's symptoms.

intents.name: Diagnosis
patterns: give me a diagnosis
what disease does my dog have ?
What disease does my dog have ?
responses: Your dog has :

intents.name: Goodbye
patterns: Bye
Goodbye
See you later
responses: Goodbye! Take care of your dog.

intents.name: Coughing
